revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox battle item |name = Miracle Seed |image = [[File:Miracle Seed.png|100px]] |caption = In game image of the ''Miracle Seed'' |location = [[Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Miracle Seed''' is a type of [[Held Items|Held Item]] that can only be equipped to [[File:Grass_Type_icon.png|30px]]Grass type Pokémon. ==Details== Raises the attack of the Pokémon holding the Item by 10%. ==Acquistion== {{Loot/head‎|Battle items}} {{LootItem|Sprout..."
